#window_size = genomic window size (bp)
#corr = Pearson's correlation (r) between WGBS and Nanopore data
#mean_step = mean distance between first and last CpG in window (bp)
#median_step = mean distance between first and last CpG in window (bp)
#mean_CpGs = mean number of CpGs in windows
#median_CpGs = median number of CpGs in windows
#n = windows count
#cov_nanop = coverage threshold for Nanopore data (q95: 95% interpercentile, min and max threshold applied)
#cov_wgbs = coverage threshold for WBGS data (q95: 95% interpercentile, min and max threshold applied)
#cov_nanop-cov_wgbs = coverage thresholds for Nanopore and WGBS
#
	window_size	corr	mean_step	median_step	mean_CpGs	median_CpGs	n	cov_nanop	cov_wgbs	cov_nanop-cov_wgbs
